entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who has been introduced as a Legilimens and is able to detect lies. He is also mentioned as having adopted twelve Grimmauld Place as their headquarters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character who is present in the conversation with Dumbledore. He is described as being angry and unable to speak properly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having told Harry and others to be nice to Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is being treated with kindness and respect by Dumbledore. He is also described as being dangerous.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as having adopted twelve Grimmauld Place as their headquarters and not taking Dumbledore's warnings about Kreacher seriously.

relationships.description: Dumbledore warns Sirius that Kreacher can be dangerous to them.
Harry is angry with Sirius for not taking Dumbledore's warnings about Kreacher seriously.
